Introduction
This topic contains information about examinations for qualifying disabilities, including
when to request an examination or medical opinion
medical opinions to determine aggravation of a pre-existing disability
, and
examination guidelines for BPOT presumptive disabilities
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Developing Claims Based On Exposure to Burn Pits and Other Toxins, Including Fine Particulate Matter (BPOT)
